entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
